name: The Cards Never Lie
description:
The Cards Never Lie is a short mystery about a psychic who becomes entangled in an investigation when one of her clients is murdered. This game was made during the Ludum Dare 25 (You Are the Villain) jam competition and won 3rd in the mood category, 7th in the audio category, and 8th overall. Features full soundtrack by Li'l Magic.

Features

  • Cold-read clients
  • Hire legmen to investigate
  • Spin a web of deceit
  • Reminisce with your homeless neighbor about Sweet Paris
